Package org.castor.spring.orm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CastorCallback
    Callback interface for Castor JDO code.
    CastorOperations
    Interface that specifies a basic set of Castor JDO operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CastorAccessor
    Base class for CastorTemplate and CastorInterceptor, defining common properties like JDOManager and flushing behavior.
    CastorInterceptor
    This interceptor binds a new JDO Database to the thread before a method, closing and removing it afterwards in case of any method outcome.
    CastorTemplate
    Helper class that simplifies Castor JDO data access code, and converts PersistenceExceptions into Spring DataAccessExceptions, following the org.springframework.dao exception hierarchy.
    CastorTransactionManager
    PlatformTransactionManager implementation for a single Castor JDO JDOManager.
    ClassDescriptorResolverFactoryBean  
    DatabaseHolder
    Holder wrapping a Castor JDO Database.
    JDOManagerUtils
    Helper class featuring methods for Castor CastorManager handling, allowing for reuse of Database instances within transactions.
    LocalCastorFactoryBean  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CastorObjectRetrievalFailureException
    Castor JDO-specific subclass of ObjectRetrievalFailureException.
    CastorOptimisticLockingFailureException
    Castor JDO-specific subclass of ObjectOptimisticLockingFailureException.
    CastorResourceFailureException
    Castor JDO-specific subclass of DataAccessResourceFailureException.
    CastorSystemException
    JDO-specific subclass of UncategorizedDataAccessException, for JDO system errors that do not match any concrete org.springframework.dao exceptions.
    CastorUnsupportedOptionException
    Castor JDO-specific subclass of DataAccessException.
